# Plots

A step of 2.5 % of the time vector's length amounts to `r rulsif_321_table_2_5percent$step %>% unique()` days. The identified change periods (CP) are shown below
<!-- in @fig-rulsif30825 and in @tbl-tblrulsif30825. -->

```{r}
#| include: false
#| layout: [[60,-1, 39], [100]]
#| fig-cap: "A plot"
#| tbl-cap: "A table"


# plot on the left
p_308_ribbon_rulsif_2_5percent

# table on the right
knitr::kable(rulsif_321_table_2_5percent %>% dplyr::select(!c(CP_period, step)),
             booktabs = T, escape = F,
             col.names = linebreak(c("Change\nPeriod (CP)", "start date", "end date", "CP duration\nin days"), align = "c")) %>% 
  kableExtra::kable_styling(position = "center", latex_options = "HOLD_position")
```
